abstract: Letter from Sen Jeff Sessions of Alabama responds to April 15 editorial criticizing his call for slowing of legal immigration in United States.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Sessions, chairman of the Senate Subcommittee on Immigration and the National Interest, takes issue with an editorial.

headline.main: Senator Jeff Sessions Argues for a Cut in Immigration

snippet: Jeff Sessions, chairman of the Senate Subcommittee on Immigration and the National Interest, takes issue with an editorial.
